rules.ruleString: Incompatible with achievement in (I/W) {AFF9500, AFG9071, AFX9500}
Unit was previously coded {ACF5950, AFF9500%, AFG9071%, AFX9500%}
(Must be enrolled in course version {0748, 0790, 0826, 1679, 1822, 3840, 3843, 3848, 4402, 4435, B6004, B6005, B6011} and Must be enrolled in course type {03, 04, 05, 06, 11, 42, 50PG})

description: This unit provides students with an introduction to accounting and an understanding of the preparation, presentation and interpretation of financial statements. In particular, emphasis is placed on accounting processes, practices and policies that enable the financial performance and financial position of an entity, as displayed by the balance sheet, income statement and statement of cash flows, to be measured, analysed and interpreted.
